description:
Minor edit at 71, doesn't change to C just yet
(via editor)
title: Pigs (Three Different Ones)

description: Corrections to guitar tracks, greatly improved accuracy of first two verses for rhythm guitar.
title: Pigs (Three Different Ones)

description:
- Rearranged tracks
- Renamed a few tracks
- Changed instrument of bass from picked bass to fretless bass
- Massive corrections to clean guitar in the interlude section. Should be mostly accurate now.
- Separated the overdrive guitar track during the interlude into the two different tracks it should be, and made corrections to both of them
- Corrections to make the chorus more accurate in the rhythm guitar track
- Minor corrections to bass and vocal tracks
title: Pigs (Three Different Ones)

description: I just fixed the credits, Roger Waters played rythm guitar on this track.
title: Pigs (Three Different Ones)

description: Fixed the bass where it comes in during the second bass solo.
title: Pigs (Three Different Ones)

description: Fixed rhythms in the vocal track. Possibly a few other minor changes that I don't remember.
title: Pigs (Three Different Ones)

description: Corrected the piano and keyboard effects' instrument. For some reason, it got changed to distortion guitar.
title: Pigs (Three Different Ones)

description:
Added keyboard effects during the intro
Added piano. The track isn't extremely accurate, but it's not terribly far from what's in the recording
Added vocals
Removed some organ parts during the interlude, and changed it to what Wright actually plays
Changed the overdrive guitar part during the interlude to be correct
Fixed some wrong notes in the clean guitar part during the interlude
title: Pigs (Three Different Ones)

description:
Removed the overdub jazz guitar. I never heard it in the song, and it sounded really bad.
Removed most of what the clean guitar plays, other than the interlude section.
Renamed some tracks.
Redid the ENTIRE drum part. It's much better than it was before, and I believe it's nearly perfect. Nobody would like Pink Floyd if Nick just beat the hell out of the snare drum every single beat.
Reworked a few measures in the overdrive guitar part. Some of them sounded really bad and had the wrong chords. Added some fills where they needed to be.
Messed with some of the rhythms in the bass solos at the beginning and after the interlude.
Separated the outro solo and the effects throughout the song into two tracks.
title: Pigs (Three Different Ones)
